steps.description: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
steps.modified_description: Coat -Coat a big microwavable cup with cooking spray

errors.description: Take a big cup instead of a 6 Oz ramekin cup.

steps.description: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
steps.modified_description: Pour-Pour 2 eggs into the ramekin cup

steps.description: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
steps.modified_description: Sprinkle -Sprinkle 2 tablespoon of cheese on cup

errors.description: Instead of 1 Tbsp add 2 Tbsp of cheese.

steps.description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife
steps.modified_description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two uneven pieces with a knife

steps.description: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.modified_description: Top -Top cup with 3 tablespoon of salsa

errors.description: Add 3 Tbsp of salsa instead of 1 Tbsp

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 1 minute 10 seconds

steps.description: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
steps.modified_description: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with unwashed lettuce.

steps.description: Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
steps.modified_description: Place -Place the egg from the cup below the lettuce.

errors.description: Place the egg below the lettuce.

steps.description: replace -replace the top of the English muffin
steps.modified_description: Replace -Replace the top of the English muffin

errors.description: Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
